languages.text: {n}Из-под кожуха древнего когитатора доносится сдавленное урчание, будто машинные духи недовольны пробуждением от сна. После нехитрых манипуляций с приборной панелью вид-скрин оживает и мигает в ожидании вашего запроса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Из-под кожуха древнего когитатора доносится сдавленное урчание, будто машинные духи недовольны пробуждением от сна. После нехитрых манипуляций с приборной панелью вид-скрин оживает и мигает в ожидании вашего запроса.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Из-под кожуха древнего когитатора доносится сдавленное урчание, будто машинные духи недовольны пробуждением от сна. После нехитрых манипуляций с приборной панелью вид-скрин оживает и мигает в ожидании вашего запроса.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

{n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resented being awakened. After a few simple manipulations with the control panel the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

{n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

{n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

languages.text: {n}機械精霊が目覚めるのを疎ましがるかのように、古代の考算機の中から控えめなうなり声が聞こえてくる。制御パネルから簡単な指示をいくつか与えると、画面が点滅しはじめ、あなたの入力を待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}機械精霊が目覚めるのを疎ましがるかのように、古代の考算機の中から控えめなうなり声が聞こえてくる。制御パネルから簡単な指示をいくつか与えると、画面が点滅しはじめ、あなたの入力を待っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un temblor apagado surge desde la carcasa del antiguo cogitador, como si los espíritus máquina gruñeran al despertar. Tras varias instrucciones sencillas, la pantalla de vídeo se ilumina y empieza a parpadear, esperando tus órdenes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un temblor apagado surge desde la carcasa del antiguo cogitador, como si los espíritus máquina gruñeran al despertar. Tras varias instrucciones sencillas, la pantalla de vídeo se ilumina y empieza a parpadear, esperando tus órdenes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}古老的沉思者外壳下传出低沉的隆隆声，仿佛机魂不情不愿地从沉眠中醒来。当你在控制面板上输入几个简单的指令后，视讯屏幕亮了起来，闪烁着，等待你的输入指令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}古老的思考器外壳下传出低沉的隆隆声，仿佛机魂不情不愿地从沉眠中醒来。当你在控制面板上输入几个简单的指令后，视讯屏幕亮了起来，闪烁着，等待你的输入指令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un léger grondement se fait entendre dans le boîtier du cogitateur antique, comme si les esprits de la machine vous en voulaient de les avoir réveillés. Après avoir entré quelques instructions basiques sur le panneau de contrôle, l'écran clignote avant de s'allumer définitivement, attendant vos commandes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un léger grondement se fait entendre dans le boîtier du cogitateur antique, comme si les esprits de la machine vous en voulaient de les avoir réveillés. Après avoir entré quelques instructions basiques sur le panneau de contrôle, l'écran clignote avant de s'allumer définitivement, attendant vos commandes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein dumpfes Grollen ertönt unter der Abdeckung des uralten Cogitators, als wären die Maschinengeister verärgert, dass sie geweckt werden. Nach einigen simplen Befehlen in der Steuerkonsole erwacht der Vid-Screen zum Leben und beginnt zu blinken. Er erwartet deine Eingabe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein dumpfes Grollen ertönt unter der Abdeckung des uralten Cogitators, als wären die Maschinengeister verärgert, dass sie geweckt werden. Nach einigen simplen Befehlen in der Steuerkonsole erwacht der Vid-Screen zum Leben und beginnt zu blinken. Er erwartet deine Eingabe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antika kavramsayarın kapağının altından hafif bir gürültü duyuluyor. Sanki makine ruhları, uyandırıldıkları için kızmış gibi. Kontrol panelinin birkaç basit yönlendirmesiyle video ekranı canlanıp aydınlanıyor, girdilerini bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A subdued rumbling comes from under the cover of the ancient cogitator, as if the machine spirits resent being awakened. After a few simple directions from the control panel, the vid-screen flashes to life and starts blinking, waiting for your input.{/n}
